name: RocketX Exchange
description: RocketX is the most advanced hybrid CEX & DEX aggregator that makes it easy to compare prices across 250+ exchanges to help traders with best prices with every Swap. For dapps & institutions, we act as a middleware by simplifying access to global crypto liquidity via a single API for in-app crypto swaps with best prices and 1-click cross chain capabilities. We are on a mission to enhance interoperability between blockchains and drive mass adoption of crypto by simplifying access to all leading blockchains via single UI and API.
